select m.question_num, q.* , case when r.is_right is not null then cast( r.is_right as signed ) else 0 end as is_Right from exam_history h join exam_question m on h.exam_id= m.exam_id join question q on m.question_id= q.question_id
left join exam_record r on h.history_id = r.history_id and q.question_id= r.question_id where h.history_id= #{historyid} order by m.question_num limit #{skip} ,#{take}
